name: Telephone-dial
tagline: Reproduction labels for rotary dial telephones
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This generator creates customised printable labels for rotary telephones. It was designed to replicate the styling of GPO / BT telephones from the 1970s-1980s, particularly the 746 and 8746 telephone models.

### What's your phone number?

### Printing labels
Use the Print option on your browser. Turn off any page scaling options to print to the correct size. A label should be 38mm (1Â½ inches) across. Circular paper punches of the correct size can be purchased from art and craft suppliers for an easy clean finish.

### Author
Designed by Peter Knight (@going-digital). Fonts are Roboto by Christian Robertson, and Special Elite by Astigmatic.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
